doc.field: Robert Levinn attended New York University School of Engineering from 1949 to 1953 and received his Bachelor of Science degree in mechanical engineering. This collection includes a 1949-1950 Palisades Handbook: A Guide to Campus Life for NYU's University Heights campus. A supply list for an E.D.11. class within the College of Engineering is also in this collection.

Robert Levinn attended New York University School of Engineering from 1949 to 1953 and received his Bachelor of Science degree in mechanical engineering. This collection includes a 1949-1950 Palisades Handbook: A Guide to Campus Life for NYU's University Heights campus. A supply list for an E.D.11. class within the College of Engineering is also in this collection.

This collection includes a 1949-1950 Palisades Handbook: A Guide to Campus Life for NYU's University Heights campus. A supply list for an E.D.11. class within the College of Engineering is also in this collection.
Robert Levinn attended New York University School of Engineering from 1949 to 1953 and received his Bachelor of Science degree in mechanical engineering.
Transferred by Lindsay Anderberg, Archivist and User Services Librarian, NYU Libraries, March 2019; the accession number associated with this gift is 2019.086.
